room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Went yesterday as a group of four friends. The most fun I've had in a couple of years on an outing! We did the Kidnapping and broke out in 56 minutes. If you want a challenge and an outright rush of adrenaline, I highly suggest doing these games! The staff was great as well. Overall a thrill!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: We had a great time being Kidnapped! Staff was friendly, the facility was nice, room was neat and the clues were interesting and challenging. Met our expectations and we can't wait to go back to try out the other scenarios.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Excellent outing!! Kidnapping was very challenging. I'm amazed we made it out!! Will definitely be back to try a different room!!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: We came to play the breakout games as a group activity with my coworkers. It is an excellent team building activity! It was soooo much fun. We did the kidnapping but I'm already planning a visit back for a different game!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: A great atmosphere! The kidnapping was super fun, and the staff helped us out along the way! Will definitely be back trying all the different rooms!
